phrases: Far beyond the deep blue Earth, you and I shall meet...
A snow-white feather will come fluttering down, swaying gently in the air.
Without holding back, I want to envelope you, my one and only love.
I know I have the power to protect the one I love, right here in my hands.
Just as I have always dreamed.
Let the wind carry off your hopes, faraway.
I have wings nobody can see.
They will take us to where we can be free.
Well, we are heading into the homestretch of the annual Miss NIT Pageant!
Our next candidate is Entry No. 16...
Give it up for last year's Miss NIT!
This contest is open to freshmen, too, so why did not you enter?
Belldandy's in the contest, is not she?
I have no intention of competing against your girlfriend!
By the way, where is that big sister of hers?
Hey, what do you think you are doing?
Since when is she an NIT student, too?
Excuse me, you are cutting into my performance time!
Holding a beauty pageant without telling Lady Urd?
I am the reigning Miss NIT!
I will thank outsiders like you to leave at once!
You will have to make yourself over for the next 100,258 years before you can...
Bigger is not always better, you know!
But it is better than nothing, no?
I happen to have a magnificent physique, thanks to years of...
The intruder has just crossed the line with a flagrant foul!
Our time-honored Miss NIT Pageant is in the greatest jeopardy of its history!
Do not you think you should stop her?
You must not go out of turn......major, Belldandy!
Did she have to say that into the microphone?
She is naive about things like that.
She is naive about things like that.
You will stop at nothing to take over as queen, will you?
Hey, who are you to talk?
I will win the title of queen on the strength of my abilities!
Now then, prepare to be dazzled by my lovely voice!
My sister falls asleep whenever she hears enka playing.
Listen, you know perfectly well that my song number is B13268!
How dare you subject me to enka!
Hey, is Belldandy's sister a magician?
Urd, how could you do such a thing?
I had to punish them for making me listen to that enka music.
Heed my call, O Spirit of the Wind...
The heavenly blessing that vibrates through the air...
Let it rain down here where I stand.
We have just witnessed a miracle, folks!
Miss Belldandy has called on the heavens to bless us with this rainfall!
Behold... she is the Goddess of the Campus!
This is what they mean by'dripping with feminine charm,' no?
What have I done to deserve this?
Listen, who are those two, anyway?
Miss Belldandy is this year's Miss NIT!
I do not think this is fair!
I refuse to accept this outcome!
The Queen and the Goddess' Secret
Hey, Urd, let us go home now, okay?
The night is still so young!
Who knew they had such awesome sake down here on Earth?
She seems to be fitting in for some weird reason.
Is Urd going to be all right, drinking all that sake?
You do not have to worry about my sister!
If we stick around any longer, she is going to make us drink too.
So why do not we go home?
That woman... how can she hold her sake like that?
I would rather die than admit defeat to anyone!
Ms. Mishima, are you all right?
I know it was not just a dream...
I could have sworn I was floating in mid-air.
Who the hell is she, anyway?
You know, this year's Miss NIT!
She sure is a beauty... no wonder she is our campus queen!
That Urd is so unbelievably sexy!
But look, there is Morisato, too.
Let me see, of course Belldandy rules, but there is something about Urd, too!
Well, I will take Belldandy any day!
Last year's campus queen is not such a hot item anymore, eh?
And it is not just her, it is her sister, too.
She claims to be an exchange student, but we have no idea where she is from.
True, she is wrapped in far too many mysteries.
And that power she wields at times is beyond human understanding.
You are right, it is certainly not normal.
She came with me to a hotel room, but nothing happened.
That is a first for me.
It really does not sit well!
Since when are you into cheap girls like her?
Oh, so you lost your campus queen crown to a cheap girl?
Forget that, do not you think we should investigate that power of hers?
If we are going to do that, we will have to find out who she is first.
If we can just find out Belldandy's true identity, then the truth will come out.
Including who the real queen is...
So I guess you and I have a common interest in this?
Well, things are starting to get interesting around here.
Something always happens when Keiichi Morisato faces some kind of danger.
In that case, we will just create our own danger for him.
All right, she is going to use her powers!
I am glad that nothing happened to you, Keiichi.
He was just about to attack us.
He looks fierce, but he is really quite gentle.
Where the heck did this dog come from, anyway?
I think a change of strategy is in order.
But our opponent has such formidable tactics at her disposal.
If we cannot get to Belldandy herself, we ask someone who knows her well.
I am so glad you enjoyed it!
Looks like we are fresh out.
I will go to the cafeteria and ask them for some.
Let us put our plan into motion.
Do not you even see what is going on around you?
There are two people trying to probe Belldandy's identity, even as we speak.
I know she can take care of herself, but you really need to watch your back.
After all, you are her one vulnerability.
When it comes to you, she seems to lose sight of everything else.
In both a good way and a bad way, that is.
It is high time you learned to see things like that, okay?
Why are you sleeping on me?
Are you perhaps wondering where Morisato is?
What a lame thing to do!
And how lame of you to fall for it...
Do you know where Keiichi is?
We have taken him into our custody.
I want to know who you are... your true identity!
But I am not hiding anything!
So you are going to feign ignorance until the end...
Not that such devilish behavior does not turn me on.
First, I want you to tell me.
Why did you blow me off when it was you who came on to me?
What does he have that I do not?
I am the better man in both looks and money!
I am superior in every way!
That has nothing to do with a person's worth.
But if you insist on going out with that guy, you will have no future!
Do you think you would actually still be happy with him?
But Keiichi's happiness... that is all I hope for in this world.
Belldandy, just leave this to me.
All right, it looks like I will have to teach you a lesson!
No good, I cannot even hear his heartbeat.
What, you say you just saw Keiichi?
Keiichi, I will be there soon...
What do you think you are doing?
I have a lot of questions for you.
If that is all, then you did not have to be so drastic!
It is not you I want to ask about.
I thought she was suspicious back when I tried to find out if she really was...
Using mysterious powers... falsifying her registration records...
Is this how badly she craved my campus queen status?
Do not tell me she infiltrated this school to threaten me, the daughter of a CEO!
She is just an exchange student, nothing more!
Well, I never expected you to give it up that easily.
But you are going to tell me the truth about her today.
He was with a gaudy-looking girl?
Are you ready to receive your punishment?
You are the one who should be bracing herself!
I asked you to please stay with me...
I asked you to please stay with me...
I asked you to please stay with me...
I have dominated many an enka contest with this voice!
It is a lullaby for you.
Just listen to my skillful tremolo and tremble in your sleep!
Do you mind living in a six-mat room?
It is not enough to take me out!
You are tougher than I thought.
You would better not cross me or you will not live to regret it!
Yes, so you say they took him to the lecture hall, is that right?
Are you enjoying these live escargot snails imported from France?
That power she used... what is it for?
Do not you remember how drunk you were?
Then, it is time to play my trump card.
What the hell are you going to do now?
Something that will be more painful for you than if you were being tortured yourself.
Keiichi, I am on my way now.
Well, I see you played right into our hands.
I wonder if it will be that easy?
Gorge yourself on the pleasures of slumber!
I asked you to please stay with me...
Why are not you falling asleep?
This is the proper way to use whips!
It looks like this is more effective on you.
Do you realize how valuable these are?
I told you... tell me her true identity and I will stop right now.
It is no good, I have got to protect Belldandy.
I am telling you, she is just an exchange student!
I guess I have no choice, then.
But that is... not the Micropet Debonair!
Of course I know this one!
It was released in 1964 and the manufacturer went bankrupt in a year!
Another manufacturer took over the model and re-launched it under...
Do you have any idea how much this is worth?
Who do you think I am?
I am the daughter of the Mishima Group's CEO, Sayoko Mishima!
I cannot believe you would hold out this long against me...
You need to stop stonewalling me!
Hey, wait, do not do it, Sayoko!
There is no way she can get in.
I see you took care of your end, too.
How are we going to cover this one up?
I just thought I would make sure their dreams were happy ones, see...
Forgive me for startling you, Miss Sayoko.
But what am I doing here?
Belldandy, you will have to do better than this to fool me.
One day when I woke up...
A day like any other... another one just beginning.
There you are, yawning... your face is still so sleepy.
Because each peaceful day we share is a miracle to me.
This is where my heart will always return...
There is only one thing I wish for.
I chase after the same dream, wherever it may go.
The love I feel for you gives me strength.
May tomorrow be as joyful as today...
One man falls for the goddess, and has plans to monopolize her.
But the underhanded tactics of this man only serve to enrage the goddess.
Next episode: Ah! Can the Auto Club Triumph?
I thought this was a rally... what is with the three-wheeler?
